events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your credentials and get back to you soon.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the backend developer opening.
A recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening call and found your skills align well with the job requirements.
Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to proceed with the next steps in the software engineering recruitment.
Your technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for May 16th at 2 PM UTC.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving and coding capabilities.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 18th at 11 AM UTC to discuss benefits and company culture.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed a great cultural fit and alignment with our company values.
A formal offer has been proposed for the Software Engineer position including salary and benefits details.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are excited about the prospect of you joining our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the job offer, and we are eager to begin the onboarding process with you.
Onboarding has officially started. You will receive further instructions about company access, training, and your first day.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome aboard as a new member of the Engineering team!
